attributes.action: Provide Funding for the Yorkshire Air Ambulance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Yorkshire Air Ambulance provides a crucial medical service across the region, transporting critically injured people to hospital for treatment, transferring patients from hospital to hospital and accessing areas which are difficult or impossible for road ambulances to reach quickly and smoothly. The YAA is almost entirely funded by voluntary donations. Please support this petition to obtain government funding for the service.
